lyrics.text: First, listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先，听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Was Mrs. Rumbould a good companion at dinner?
lyrics.translation: 伦伯尔德夫人在晚餐时是个好伴侣吗？

lyrics.text: Last week at a dinner party, the hostess asked me to sit next to Mrs. Rumbould.
lyrics.translation: 上周在一次晚宴上，女主人让我坐在朗博尔德夫人旁边。

lyrics.text: Mrs. Rumbould was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress.
lyrics.translation: 伦伯尔德夫人是一位身材高大、不苟言笑的女士，穿着一件紧身的黑色连衣裙。

lyrics.text: She did not even look up when I took my seat beside her.
lyrics.translation: 我坐在她旁边时，她甚至没有抬头。

lyrics.text: Her eyes were fixed on her plate and in a short time she was busy eating.
lyrics.translation: 她的眼睛盯着她的盘子，不一会儿她就忙着吃饭了。

lyrics.text: A new player is coming to the Globe soon, I said.
lyrics.translation: 一个新演员很快就要来环球剧院了，我说。

lyrics.text: Will you be spending your holidays abroad this year?
lyrics.translation: 今年你会在国外度假吗？

lyrics.text: Will you be staying in England? I asked.
lyrics.translation: 你会留在英格兰吗？我问道。

lyrics.text: In despair, I asked her whether she was enjoying the dinner.
lyrics.translation: 在绝望中，我问她是否喜欢这顿晚餐。

lyrics.text: If you ate more and talked less, we would both enjoy our dinner.
lyrics.translation: 如果你多吃点少说点，我们两个都会更享受这顿晚餐。
